name: Emobi
headline: A single point integration for secure and automated EV charging.
description:
Emobi is the leading EV charging digital infrastructure that offers a single point of legal, financial, and technical integration, empowering EV automakers and fleets with secure, reliable, and seamless charging across networks, while maximizing charger utilization. The company also enables JustPlug and Plug & Charge: secure and fully-automated charging technology.

To learn more, visit www.emobi.ai.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:api; industry:energy; industry:electric-vehicles; industry:ml; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Lin Sun Fa, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Lin Sun Fa, CEO at Emobi, is an EV enthusiast with a deep knowledge in cybersecurity. Lin plays a leading role in the climate tech and energy space, garnered trust from organizations and leaders in the industry. He earned his Cybersecurity degree at Purdue University and was previously the global director of operations at Solar Chapter, a World-bank affiliated non-profit. In his free time, he is an avid traveler and a loving corgi-dad.

generated_description:
Emobi, founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, is shaping the future of electric vehicle (EV) charging in a big way. Based in San Francisco and powered by a small but capable team of nine, Emobi offers a unified platform—think of it as the digital infrastructure backbone—designed for secure and automated EV charging. 

Their mission revolves around providing a seamless, reliable, and integrated charging experience that combines legal, financial, and technical aspects into one streamlined service. This isn’t just about plugging in your car; it’s about enhancing charger utilization, especially in a fragmented charging market. They support technologies like JustPlug and Plug & Charge, which are all about making the charging process as effortless and secure as possible.

Emobi caters to a diverse customer base, including automakers, fleet operators, navigation systems, and even government entities. They boast partnerships with over 100 e-mobility companies and agencies, highlighting their integral role in the electric future.

Their offerings include:
- **Emobi Hub**: A solution for Charge Point Operators (CPOs) and Electric Mobility Service Providers (eMSPs) to enhance exposure and access to charging stations.
- **Plug & Charge**: Advanced technology enabling secure, automated charging under ISO standards.
- **Consulting Services**: Tailored strategies for navigating the evolving EV landscape.

Emobi is at the forefront of innovation with its various labs focused on interoperability and advanced charging technologies. They keep close ties with notable figures in the tech community, including Gustaf Alstromer as a Group Partner.

If you're interested in transforming how we think about EV infrastructure, Emobi is definitely worth a look. You can learn more at their website: [www.emobi.ai](https://www.emobi.ai).
